Inline-Images: image001.jpg 
Dear Judge Nathan: 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca, please see attached the Proposed Redactions to Ms. Maxwell's Motion for an Order 
Authorizing a Subpoena Pursuant to Fed. R. Crim. P 17(c)(3), the redacted version will be filed on the public docket today. 
Regards, 
Nicole 
From: Nicole Simmons 
Sent: Sunday, November 14, 2021 9:57 PM 
To: 'Nathan NYSD Chambers' < 
Cc: Jeff Pagliuca 
• 
>; Laura 
Menninger 
; 'CEverdell@CohenGresser.com' 
Subject: U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) [Maxwell's Motn for Order re. Fed. R. Crim. P. 17(c) Sub) 
Dear Judge Nathan: 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca, please see attached Ms. Maxwell's Motion for an Order Authorizing a Subpoena 
Pursuant to Fed. R. Crim. P 17(c)(3). Pursuant to our established protocol, we are submitting the Motion and Exhibit to 
the Court under temporary seal to allow the government to propose any redactions it deems necessary. 
Regards, 
Nicole 
Nicole Simmons 
Haddon. Morgan and 
Foreman.
